docs.title: Home
docs.text:
This is a wiki written for MACCs, by MACCs. Specifically, by the 2022-2025 and 2021-2024 MACC generations of Kway.

Welcome to the hellhole. The MACC Wiki is an archival project dedicated to preserving the wonderful and wild school memories of 2021-2025. It also aims to help new MACC students adjust to the coming three school years of bullshit.

To get you started:

  • Assignments

  • Classes

  • Events

  • Glossary

  • Locations

  • Quotes

  • Media

  • People

  • Traditions

Happy browsing!

If you wish to make a suggestion or recommend some info to the wiki, see Contact.
